content: I know everybody on this island seems so happy on this island. Everything is by design. I know everybody on this island has a role on this island. So maybe I can roll with mine. I can lead with pride, I can make us strong, I'll be satisfied if I play along. But, the voice inside sings a different song, what is wrong with me? See the light as it shines on the sea? It's blinding. But no one knows, how deep it goes. And it seems like it's calling out to me, so come find me, and let me know. What's beyond that line, will I cross that line?
author: Auliâ€™i Cravalho
